archives.justification: Ignore everything not included in the module itself

differences.justification: Ignore new methods for Zeebe extensions, as these are not meant to be implemented but simply consumed; as such, new methods are perfectly fine to add
The abstract builders are usually not used outside of this project; a caller uses the concrete builder that inherits from the abstract builder.
Validators are used only internally; they should not used or referenced from outside of the module
